Data Sourcing and Generation Steps:

1. SOURCE DATA DOWNLOAD
   Option A - Manual download:
     Download: https://github.com/OreStudio/OreStudio/archive/refs/heads/main.zip
     Extract: Unzip into a temporary directory
     Copy:
       - Content of Examples directory into external/ore/examples
       - xsd directory into external/ore/xsd.

2. CODE GENERATION
   Regenerate C++ domain types from the XSD schemas using xsdcpp:
     ./projects/ores.codegen/scripts/xsdcpp_generate_ore.sh
   Requires xsdcpp on PATH. If built locally, prepend to PATH:
     PATH="/path/to/xsdcpp/build/src:$PATH" ./projects/ores.codegen/scripts/xsdcpp_generate_ore.sh
   This regenerates:
     - projects/ores.ore/include/ores.ore/domain/domain.hpp
     - projects/ores.ore/src/domain/domain.cpp

3. COMMIT TO REPOSITORY
   git add external/ore/* projects/ores.ore/include/ores.ore/domain/domain.hpp projects/ores.ore/src/domain/domain.cpp
   git commit -m "[data] Update ORE Sample Data"
